summary: All 5 business domain files pass comprehensive validation. Each file contains exactly 16 variants (within 15-20 range), all required fields are present, meta distribution is healthy with no clustering issues, language safety checks pass, and all operators are supported. No duplicates or structural issues found.

notes: Healthy tone distribution: balanced across all 4 types
Only 12.5% marked as dominant - excellent narrative balance
All required fields present: condition_tree, outcome_text, variant_meta (tone, confidence_level, dominance, certainty_note)
Appropriate tone for growth context: 43.75% opportunity (expected for growth/win scenarios)
Note: variant_meta appears before outcome_text in first variant (acceptable ordering)
Appropriate tone for loss/risk context: 0% opportunity, 43.75% cautionary + 43.75% stabilizing (appropriate for risk scenarios)
25% dominant is acceptable for risk scenarios where strong signals need emphasis
Language maintains neutral, advisory tone without fear-mongering
Balanced tone distribution appropriate for start-phase context
Only 12.5% dominant - good for start scenarios where multiple factors matter
Appropriate tone for partnership complexity: 0% opportunity, 56.25% stabilizing (emphasizes structure/clarity)
Only 12.5% dominant - good balance for complex scenarios
Language focuses on clarity, structure, and risk-management rather than fear

globalWarnings: MONEY_BUSINESS_GROWTH_WIN has 43.75% opportunity tone (7/16) - slightly high but acceptable for growth context
MONEY_BUSINESS_LOSS_RISK has 25% dominant variants (4/16) - acceptable for risk scenarios where strong signals need emphasis

validationDetails.variantCountCheck: PASS - All files have exactly 16 variants (within 15-20 range)
validationDetails.duplicateCodeCheck: PASS - No duplicate variant codes found within any file
validationDetails.requiredFieldsCheck: PASS - All 80 variants (16 Ã— 5) have: condition_tree, effect_json.outcome_text, effect_json.variant_meta (tone, confidence_level, dominance, certainty_note)
validationDetails.metaDistributionCheck: PASS - Healthy distribution across all meta fields: no file has >70% same confidence level, no file has all variants marked as dominant
validationDetails.languageSafetyCheck: PASS - Spot checks confirm: (1) Uses advisory language ("may", "can", "consider") in outcome_text, (2) No guarantees or absolutes in outcome_text, (3) No astrology theory explanations in outcome_text, (4) No fear-based content, (5) Words like "must", "should", "will" only appear in certainty_note (metadata), not in user-facing outcome_text
validationDetails.structuralIntegrityCheck: PASS - All 136 operator usages are supported: planet_in_house, transit_planet_in_house, dasha_running, overall_benefic_score, overall_malefic_score, generic_condition. No unsupported operators found.
validationDetails.remediesReferenceCheck: PASS - No references to remedies found in outcome_text fields (as required)

productionReadiness: READY - All validation checks pass. Files are production-ready for deployment.
